"A.D.2028/3/29/10:00": "Even today, there are odd jobs around the Student Council... Also, I have to really look at the school's entrance ceremony preparations, otherwise I won't know what's going on."
"Because of that, I couldn't enter \"PSO2\" yesterday. Now, let's hurry and finish this work."

"Really Hitsugi.
You still play that thing?"
"Urgh, that voice..."
"I knew it- Big brother... Enga."
"What an unpleasant surprise we have here, I'm really happy to see you though, little sis."
"W-what on earth are you doing here! This is the Girl's Dorm! Males are forbidden!"
"Idiot, you forgot that family members are excluded from that rule right."
"Urgh. T-then what do you want?"
"There's nothing wrong with you. It's YOUR room that I need to check on."
"E-eh? You mean my room..! N-nothing's changed at all in there. What's all of the sudden!?"
"As the head of the Yasaka's family, I have to make sure that my sister's well organized. That includes her wellbeing and hygiene of her room."
"...Even so, it doesn't seem like you any grew taller at all."
"Q-Quiet you! It's none of your business! Ah- come on! Stop petting my head like I'm a kid!"
"Let's go back to what we said. Hitsugi, are you really sure that nothing has changed in your room?"
"...W-why do you want to know?"
"I'm the one asking you. There's nothing in there right?"
"...Of course not."
"...That's good then."
"Wait a minute big bro! Answer my question! Why did you have to ask me about that!?"
"...That reminds me Hitsugi. I've heard that you're to become the next Student Council President right?"
"An excellent thing is a good thing. It's also good to have power too."
"With that said, don't fall behind the flow."
"Without any resolve, nor being prepared, if you do anything to pry everything, irreparable things will appear amongst them."
"What do you mean by that?.."
"I just answered your question. All that's left is for you to figure it out yourself, future School Council President."
"Ah-wait up! Geez! He always give you things to think about."
"Obtaining power after becoming a perfect Student President, and... Helping \"Mother\". What's bad about that, idiot brother."
"Sorry Kohri. I'm a bit late cause my brother showed up."
"Oh, you just came at the right time."
"You're... That pervert we saw earlier! Hagith Anie if I recall!"
"What a terrible way to remember a person!"
"H-Hitsugi..! I'm glad! I'm soo relieved!"
"I'm relieved, Hitsugi! Soo glad you came..! I believed in you!"
"K-Kohri, aren't you exaggerating a bit here?.. Wai- It can't be!-"
"I didn't do anything. Nothing at all. I was a graduate student from here. I was also the Student President here 5 years ago."
"The previous Student President... Then you're also part of the \"Mother Cluster\"..."
"All Student Presidents here, without exceptions, are part of the \"Mother Cluster\" right? Of course, I'm no different."
"I was walking past and thought of stopping by to visit. It's been a while since I felt like a senpai in here but, I went a bit too far I guess."
"I wanted to ask High School students about their thoughts on our Monitor apps, although that can wait until next time. Well... I'll see you around, Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Kohri, it's okay now, that pervert left already... Kohri? Are you really okay?"
"...Say, Hitsugi. Do you remember the time when \"Mother\"... Invited you into \"Mother Cluster\"?"
"I still remember it until now. It's something I'll never forget."
"Back then, I didn't have any friends. I was all alone... That's when \"Mother\" started guiding me. Leading me to \"Mother Cluster\"."
"And then, I was able to meet you, Hitsugi. \"Mother\" made sure that I met you."
"To my lonely self, you're my very first friend. My first important person."
"Because I followed \"Mother's\" words... It's thanks to \"Mother\" that I'm able to meet and get along with you, Hitsugi... And then-also..!"
"Kohri..."
"...Hitsugi, you won't go anywhere right? Your place is here, Hitsugi."
"Everything will be okay if you listen to \"Mother\". Everyone will be happy. So... Don't go anywhere, okay?"
"...What \"Mother\" says, huh."
"The sense of trust with \"Mother\" is amazing."
"...What is \"Mother\" exactly? Seems like it's an overwhelming existence."
"On the other hand, Hitsugi's brother did mention that their height differences are somewhat similar to a parent-to-child thing."
